{{Description|Offer the Hydro Sigils you obtain from your adventures into the Fountain of Lucine to receive your guerdons from the fountain's waters.|System Unlock: Offerings to the Fountain of Lucine}}
'''Fountain of Lucine's Accolades''' is an [[Offering System]] that is leveled with [[Hydro Sigil]]s. It can be found at the [[Fountain of Lucine]] in [[Court of Fontaine Region]], [[Fontaine]].

Fountain of Lucine's Accolades is unlocked by walking near the Fountain of Lucine or automatically after completing {{Quest|Prelude of Blancheur and Noirceur}}.

Prior to [[Version 4.6]], the maximum level was limited to 20, 30 and 40 in Versions 4.0, 4.1 and 4.2-4.5 respectively despite the possibility of obtaining more than enough Hydro Sigils. The game prevented players from offering more by displaying the following error: ''"Max level reached for the current version."''

==Rewards==
Raising the Fountain of Lucine level requires {{Item|Hydro Sigil}} offered in groups of '''30'''. A total of '''1500''' Hydro Sigils are required to reach the maximum level. Reaching the maximum level will grant the {{Achievement|Dew Song}}.

All levels, except level 40 and 50, will reward: {{Card|Adventure EXP|200|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

Level 40 will instead reward: {{Card|Dream Solvent|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

Level 50 will reward: {{Card|Model Meka: "Age of Progress"|1|quality=4|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}
